GSP33brsgor1u:4758: padārthasmaraṇasyāpi padajñānāntarabhāvitvāttena saṃskārasahitāntyavarṇātmakapadasya jñānaṃ na yuktamityakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4768: sphoṭe 'pi kiṃ mānamityāśaṅkyaikaṃ padamiti pratyakṣapramāṇamityāha-sa ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4769_0: yathā ratnatattvaṃ bahubhiścākṣuṣapratyayaiḥ sphuṭaṃ bhāsate tathā gavādipadasphoṭo
GSP33brsgor1u:4769_1: gakāradyekaikavarṇakṛtapratyayaiḥ sphoṭaviṣayairāhitāḥ saṃskārā bījaṃ yasmin citte
GSP33brsgor1u:4769_3: citte ekaṃ gauritipadamiti pratyayaḥ pratyakṣastadviṣayatayā spaṣṭamavabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4772: yena varṇāntaravaiyarthyaṃ kintu ratnavadbahupratyayasaṃskṛte citte samyaksphoṭābhivyaktirityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsgor1u:4776: nanu tadevedaṃ padamiti pratyabhijñā bhramaḥ, udāttādibhedapratyayādityata āha-bhedeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4780: vapanānantaraṃ ta eveme keśā iti dhīrbhrāntiriti yuktaṃ, bhedadhīvirodhāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:4781: sa evāyaṃ varṇa iti dhīstu pramaiva, bādhakābhāvādityāha-neti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4784: yattvayā pītaṃ jalaṃ tadeva mayā pītamityādau /
GSP33brsgor1u:4785: na tatheha vyaktibhedaḥ siddha iti pariharati-na /
GSP33brsgor1u:4795: astu tarhi pratyayadvayaprāmāṇyāya bhedābhedayoḥ satyatvaṃ, tatrāha-kathaṃ hīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4797: nanu vāyusaṃyogāderatīndriyatvānna tadgatavaicitryasyodāttatvādervarṇeṣu pratyakṣāropaḥ saṃbhavatītyaruciṃ vadiṣyansvamatamāha-athaveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4805: pratyuccāraṇaṃ varṇā anuvartante dhvanirvyāvartata iti bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4806: anyathā vācike jape varṇeṣvavyakteṣu dhvanibuddhiḥ syāt,
GSP33brsgor1u:4807: dundubhyādidhvanau śabdatvamātreṇa gṛhyamāṇe ayamavyakto varṇa iti dhīḥ syāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4808: evaṃ dhvanyupādhikatve svamate guṇaṃ vadanvāyūpādhikatve pūrvoktāmaruciṃ darśayati-evañcetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4812: evaṃ viruddhadharmakadhvanīnāṃ bhede 'pi na teṣvanugatā varṇā bhidyanta ityuktam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4814: yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādiviruddhānekavyaktiṣvabhinnaṃ gotvaṃ tathā dhvaniṣu varṇā abhinnā evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4817: yadvā udāttatvādibhedaviśiṣṭatayā pratyabhijñāyamānatvādvarṇānāṃ bheda ityāśaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntena nirasyati-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4818: varṇānāṃ sthāyitvaṃ prasādhya teṣāmeva vācakatvaṃ vaktuṃ sphoṭaṃ vighaṭayati-varṇebhyaśceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4820: cakṣuṣā darpaṇayuktāyāṃ buddhau mukhavacchrotreṇa varṇayuktāyāṃ buddhau vinaiva hetvantaraṃ sphoṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityāha-jhaṭitīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4821: yasyāṃ saṃvidi yor'tho bhāsate sā tatra pramāṇam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4822: ekapadamiti buddhau varṇā eva sphuranti nātiriktasphoṭa iti na sā sphoṭe pramāṇamityāha--na /
GSP33brsgor1u:4824: nanu gopadabuddheḥ sphoṭo viṣayo gakārādīnāṃ tu vyañjakatvādanuvṛttirityata āha--yadi hīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4828: nanu tatraikadeśādirūpādhirasti, prakṛte ka upādhirityata āha--yā tviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4833: uttamavṛddhoktānām varṇānāṃ krameṇāntyavarṇaśravaṇānantaraṃ bālasyaikasmṛtyārūḍhānāṃ madhyamavṛddhasya pravṛttyādiliṅgānumitaikārthadhīhetutvaniścaye satyekapadavākyatvaniścayāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:4836: nanu nityavibhūnāṃ varṇānāṃ kathaṃ kramaḥ kathaṃ vā padatvajñānenārthadhīhetutvaṃ, tatrāha-vṛddheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4837_1: etatkramaitatsaṃkhyāvanta etadarthaśaktā iti gṛhītāḥ santaḥ śrotuḥ pravṛttikāle tathaiva
GSP33brsgor1u:4841: sthirāṇi gatyādisāmānyāni kramaviśeṣavanti gṛhītasaṃgatikānyarthabodhakānīti kḷpteṣu sāmānyeṣu prakriyā saṃcārayitavyā na tvakḷptaḥ sphoṭaḥ kalpanīya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4848_0: pūrvatantrasiddhameva vedasya nityatvaṃ devādivyaktisṛṣṭau tadvācakaśabdasyāpi sṛṣṭerasiddhamityāśaṅkya
GSP33brsgor1u:4849: yajñena pūrvasukṛtena vāco vedasya lābhayogyatāṃ prāptāḥ santo yājñikāstāmṛṣiṣu sthitāṃ labdhavanta iti mantrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4859: vyavahārāvicchedājjñāyate ceti vedasyānapekṣatvena prāmāṇye na kaścidvirodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:4860: nirlepalaye tu saṃbandhanāśāt punaḥ sṛṣṭau kenacitpuṃsā saṃketaḥ kartavya iti puruṣabuddhisāpekṣatvena vedasyāprāmāṇyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4863: tathāca saṃskārātmanā śabdārthatatsaṃbandhānāṃ satāmeva punaḥ sṛṣṭāvabhivyakternānityatvam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4865: viṣamasṛṣṭau hi saṃketāpekṣā na tulyasṛṣṭāviti pariharati-tatredamityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4868: nanvastvanādisaṃsāre saṃbandhasyānāditvaṃ tathāpi mahāpralayavyavadhānādasmaraṇe kathaṃ vedārthavyavahāraḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4872: atha tadā suṣuptau prāṇe paramātmani jīva ekībhavati enaṃ prāṇaṃ sa jīvaḥ tadaitīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4876: svapnavatkalpitasyājñātasattvābhāvāt darśanaṃ sṛṣṭiḥ adarśanaṃ laya iti dṛṣṭisṛṣṭipakṣaḥ śrutyabhipreta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4881: iti yadyapi tathāpi na prākṛtavaditi yojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4883: bādhābhāvāditi nyāyānugṛhītaśrutyādibhiḥ sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānaṃ bādhyamityāha-yathā hītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4884: nanu tathāpi pūrvakalpeśvarāṇāṃ muktatvādasminkalpe ko 'nusaṃdhātetyata āha-tataśceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4888_0: pūrvaṃ kalpādau sṛjati tasmai brahmaṇe prahiṇoti gamayati tasya buddhau vedānāvirbhāvayati
GSP33brsgor1u:4888_1: yastaṃ devaṃ svātmākāraṃ mahāvākyotthabuddhau prakāśamānaṃ śaraṇaṃ paramamabhayasthānaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:4889: na kevalamekasyaiva jñānātiśayaḥ kintu bahūnāṃ śākhādraṣṭṛṇāmiti viśvāsārthamāha-smarantīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4891: vedāntare 'pi kāṇḍasūktamantrāṇāṃ draṣṭāro baudhāyanādibhiḥ smṛtā ityāha-pratīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4899: tathāca jñānādhikaiḥ kalpāntaritaṃ vedaṃ smṛtvā vyavahārasya pravartitatvādvedasyānāditvamanapekṣatvaṃ cāvirūddhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4910: karmaṇi vihitaniṣiddhatvākāreṇāpūrvaṃ, kriyātvena saṃskāraṃ ca janayanti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4915: sa eva svabhāvaḥ prakṛtirvāsaneti ca gīyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:4916: evaṃ karmaṇāṃ sṛṣṭisādṛśyamuktvā svopādāne līnakāryasaṃskārarūpaśaktibalādapi sādṛśyamāha-pralīyamānamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4919: avidyāyāṃ līnakāryātmakasaṃskārādanyāḥ śaktayo na kalpyāḥ manābhāvādrauravācca /
GSP33brsgor1u:4921: ato 'vidyātatkāryādanyāḥ śaktayo na santi ātmāvidyaiva tacchaktiriti siddhānta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4924: yathā suptotthitasya pūrvacakṣurjātīyameva cakṣurjāyate tacca pūrvarūpajātīyameva rūpaṃ gṛhṇāti na rasādikaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4925: evaṃ bhogya lokā bhogāśrayāḥ prāṇinikāyā bhogahetukarmāṇi saṃskārabalātpūrvalokāditulyānyeveti niyama ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4935: bhāvidṛṣṭyā yajamāno 'gniḥ annādo 'ragnirahaṃ syāmiti kāmayitvā kṛttikānakṣatrābhimānidevāyāgnaye aṣṭasu kapāleṣu pacanīyaṃ havirniruptavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4937: jhrnanu yajamāno 'gnirbhāvī uddeśyāgninā samānanāmarūpaḥ kalpāntare bhavati /
GSP33brsgor1u:4938: evaṃ 'rudro vā akāmayata''viṣṇurvā akāmayata'ityatrāpi tathā vaktavyaṃ, tadayuktam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4946: tasmājjanmanāśavadvigrahāṅgīkāre 'pi karmaṇi śabde ca virodhābhāvāddevānāmasti vidyādhikāra iti sthitam //30//
GSP33brsgor1u:4954: dyulokākhyavaṃśadaṇḍe antarikṣarūpe madhvapūpe sthita ādityo devānāṃ modanānmadhviva madhvityāropya dhyānaṃ kāryam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4956: astu vasvādīnāṃ tatrādhikāra ityāśaṅkya teṣāmapi tatra dhyeyatvātprāpyatvācca na dhyātṛtvamityāha-punaśceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4958_0: tebhyaḥ somājyādidravyāṇi hutāni lohitaśuklakṛṣṇaparaḥ kṛṣṇagopyākhyāni pañcāmṛtāni
GSP33brsgor1u:4964: ekā vāgiti saptasvindriyeṣu śiraścamasatīrastheṣu saptarṣidhyānaṃ kāryamityāha-tathemāveveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4975: kiñca vigrahābhāvāddevādīnāṃ na kvāpyadhikāra ityāha-jyotiṣi bhāvācceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4976: ādityaḥ sūryaścandraḥ śukro 'ṅgāraka ityādiśabdānāṃ jyotiḥpiṇḍeṣu prayogasya bhāvātsattvānna vigrahavāndevaḥ kaścidastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4989: vigraho haviṣāṃ bhoga aiśvaryaṃ ca prasannatā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4995: vrīhyādivadprayogavidhigṛhītā mantrāḥ prayogasaṃbanddhābhidhānārthā nājñātavigrahādiparā iti mīmāṃsakā ācakṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5009: yatra yasyādhikāraḥ saṃbhavati sa tatrādhikārīti nyāyastulya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5010: yataḥ sarveṣāṃ sarvatrādhikāro na saṃbhavati tato na cāpodyetatyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5011: tadbrahma yo yo devādīnāṃ madhye pratyaktvenābudhyata sa tadbrahmābhavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5013: tata indravirocanau surāsurarājau prajāpatiṃ brahmavidyāpradaṃ jagmaturiti ca liṅgamastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5014: kimatra brahmāmṛtamiti gandharvapraśne yājñavalkya uvāca tamiti mokṣadharmeṣu śrutaṃ devādīnāmadhikāraliṅgamityāha-smārtamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5015: yathā bālānāṃ golakeṣu cakṣurādipadaprayoge 'pi śāstrajñairgolakātiriktendriyāṇi svīkriyante,
GSP33brsgor1u:5016: yathā jyotirādau sūryādiśabdaprayoge 'pi vigrahavaddevatā svīkāryā ityāha-jyotirādīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5020: subrahmaṇya udgātṛgaṇastha ṛtvik tatsaṃbandhī yor'thavādaḥ 'indra, agaccha'ityādiḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5022: muniṃ meṣo bhūtvā jahāreti jñāpanārthaṃ meṣa, itīndrasaṃbodhanamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5023: yaduktamādityādayo mṛdādivadacetanā eveti, tanna, sarvatra jaḍajaḍāṃśadvayasattvādityāha-mṛditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:5024: ādityādau ko jaḍabhāgaḥ kaścetanāṃśa iti, tatrāha-jyotirādestviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5025: mantrādikaṃ padaśaktyā bhāsamānavigrahādau svārthe na pramāṇaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5028: anyaparādapi vākyādbādhābhāve svārtho grāhya ityāha-atra brūma iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5030: tṛṇādau pratyayo 'sti vigrahādau sa nāstīti vaiṣamyaṃ śaṅkate-atrāheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5031: vidhyuddeśo vidhivākyaṃ, tadekavākyatayā praśasto vidhirityevārthavādeṣu pratyayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5037: nañpadamekaṃ yadā surāṃ pibediti padābhyāmanveti tadā padaikavākyamekamevārthānubhavaṃ karoti natu padadvayaṃ pṛthaksurāpānaṃ bodhayati,
GSP33brsgor1u:5039: arthavādastu bhūtārthasaṃsargaṃ stutidvāraṃ bodhayanvidhinā vākyaikavākyatāṃ bhajata ityasti vigrahādyanubhava ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5045: yatra 'vajrahastaḥ purandaraḥ'ityādau mānāntarasaṃvādavisaṃvādau na stastatra bhūtārthavāda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5050: na cobhyaparatve vākyabhedaḥ, avāntarārthasya mahāvākyārthatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5052: nanu kleśātmake karmaṇi vidhiḥ phalaṃ vinānupapanna iti bhavatu 'yanna duḥkhena saṃbhinnam'ityarthavādasiddhaḥ svargo vidhipramāṇakaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5053: vigrahaṃ vinā vidheḥ kānupapattiḥ, tāmāha-na hīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5054: uddiśya tyāgānupapattyā cetasyāroho 'ṅgīkārya ityatra śrutimapyāha-yasyā iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5058: kiñca suprasannavigrahavaddevatāṃ tyaktvā śabdamātraṃ devateti bhaktirayuktetyāha-naca śabdeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5059: na cākṛtimātraṃ śabdaśakyamastu kiṃ vigraheṇeti vācyaṃ, nirvyaktyākṛtyayogāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:5067: sarvaṃ ghaṭābhinnaṃ, vastutvāt, ghaṭavaditi jagadvaicitryaṃ nāstītyapi sa brūyāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:5068: tathā kṣatriyābhāvaṃ varṇāśramābhāvaṃ varṇāśramādyavyavasthāṃ ca brūyāt, niraṅkuśabuddhitvāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:5073_1: pṛthivyādipañcake samutthite dhāraṇayā jite yogaguṇe cāṇimādike pravṛtte yogābhivyaktaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:5073_2: tejomayaṃ śarīraṃ prāptasya yogino na rogādisparśa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5077: ekameva devādīnāṃ brahmavidyādhikāre satyeva devatyaprāptidvārā kramamuktiphalānyupāsanāni yujyante /
GSP33brsgor1u:5083: śugasya tadanādaraśravaṇāt tadādravaṇāt sūcyate hi | BBs_1,3.34 |
GSP33brsgor1u:5086: pūrvatra devādīnāmadhikārasidhyaryaṃ mantrādīnāṃ bhūtārthe vigrahādau samanvayoktyā vedāntānāmapi bhūtārthe brahmaṇi samanvayo dṛḍhīkṛtaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5087: atrāpi śūdraśabdasya śrautasya kṣatriye samanvayoktyā sa dṛḍhīkriyata ityadhikaraṇadvayasya prāsaṅgikasyāsminsamanvayādhyāye 'ntarbhāva iti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5088: pūrvapakṣe śūdrasyāpi dvijavadvedāntaśravaṇe pravṛttiḥ, siddhānte tadabhāva iti phalam //
GSP33brsgor1u:5090: sa kiṃ śūdramadhikīroti na veti saṃbhavāsaṃbhavābhyāṃ saṃdehe pūrvapakṣamāha-tatra śūdrasyāpītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5093: jānaśrutiḥ kila ṣaṭ śatāni gavāṃ rathaṃ ca raikāya gurave nivedya māṃ śikṣayetyuvāca /
GSP33brsgor1u:5096: hāreṇa niṣkeṇa yukta itvā gantā ratho hāretvā sa ca gobhiḥ saha he śūdra,
GSP33brsgor1u:5101: adhyayanavidhinā saṃskṛto vedastadutthamāpātajñānaṃ ca vedārthavicāreṣu śāstrīyaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tadabhāvācchūdrasyārthitvādisaṃbhavanyāyāsiddhernāsti vedāntavicārādhikāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5102: yadvādhyayanasaṃskṛtena vedena vidito niścito vedārtho yena tasya vedārtheṣu vidhiṣvadhikāro nānyasya,
GSP33brsgor1u:5115: tarhi śūdraśabdasyātra śrutasya kor'tha ityāśaṅkya sūtreṇārthamāha-śakyate cetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5116: jānaśrutirnāma rājā nidāghasamaye rātrau prāsādatale suṣvāpa,
GSP33brsgor1u:5117: tadā tadīyānnadānādiguṇagaṇatoṣitā ṛṣayo 'sya hitārthaṃ haṃsā bhūtvā mālārūpeṇa tasyoparyājagmuḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5120: kiṃ na paśyasi jānaśruterasya tejaḥ svargaṃ vyāpya sthitaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5125: sayugvānaṃ yugva gantrī śakaṭī tayā saha sthitaṃ raikvamivaitadvacanamāttha /
GSP33brsgor1u:5126: raikvasya hi brahmiṣṭhasya tejo duratikramaṃ nāsyānātmajñasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5127: asmadvacanakhinno rājā śakaṭaliṅgena raikaṃ jñātvā vidyāvānbhaviṣyatīti haṃsānāmabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5131: sā śūdraśabdena raikveṇa sūcyate hīti sūtrānvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5132: śrutayaugikārthalābhe sati ananvitarūḍhyarthastyājya iti nyāyadyotanārtho hiśabdaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5143: śunakasyāpatyaṃ kapigotraṃ purohitamabhipratārināmakaṃ rājānaṃ ca kakṣasenasyāpatyaṃ sūdena pariviṣyamāṇau tau bhoktumupaviṣṭau baṭurbhikṣitavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5144: nanvasya caitrarathitvaṃ na śrutamityata āha-caitrarathitvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5145: etena dvirātreṇeti chāndogyaśrutyaiva pūrvaṃ citrarathasya kāpeyayoga uktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5147: rājavaṃśyānāṃ hi prāyeṇa purohitavaṃśyā yājakā bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5150: kṣattā sūtastasya raikvānveṣaṇāya preṣaṇaṃ annagodānādikaṃ ca jānaśruteḥ kṣatriyatve liṅgam //35//
GSP33brsgor1u:5155: atra śūdraśabdo yaugika eveti na śūdrasyādhikāra iti sthitam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5158: iha vidyāgrahaṇāṅgasyopanayanasaṃskārasya sarvatra parāmarśācchūdrasya tadabhāvānna vidyādhikāraḥ ityucyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:5163: brahmaparā vedapāragāḥ saguṇabrahmaniṣṭhāḥ paraṃ nirguṇaṃ brahmānveṣamāṇā eṣa pippalādastajjijñāsitaṃ sarvaṃ vakṣyatīti niścitya te bharadvājādayaḥ ṣaḍ ṛṣayastamupagatā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5164: nanu vaiśvānaravidyāyāmṛṣīnrājānupanīyaiva vidyāmuvāceti śruteranupanītasyāpyasti vidyādhikāra ityata āha-tānheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5165: te ha samitpāṇayaḥ pūrvāhne praticakramira iti pūrvavākye brāhmaṇā upanayanārthamāgatā iti upanayanaprāptiṃ darśayitvā niṣidhyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:5174: taṃ mātovāca bhartṛsevāvyagratayāhamapi tava piturgotraṃ na jānāmi,
GSP33brsgor1u:5175: jabālā tu nāmāhamasmi satyakāmo nāma tvamasīti etāvajjānāmīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5176: tataḥ sa jābālo gautamamāgatya tena kiṅgotro 'sīti pṛṣṭa uvāca,
GSP33brsgor1u:5177: nāhaṃ gotraṃ vedmi na mātā vetti parantu me mātrā kathitaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5185: tadarthaṃ samidhamāhareti gautamasya pravṛtteśca liṅgānna śūdrasyādhikāra ityāha-tadabhāveti //37//
GSP33brsgor1u:5191: asya śūdrasya dvijaiḥ paṭhyamānaṃ vedaṃ pramādācchṛṇvataḥ sīsalākṣābhyāṃ taptābhyāṃ śrotradvayapūraṇaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kāryamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5199: siddhānāṃ siddherdurapahnavatve 'pi sādhakaiḥ śūdraiḥ kathaṃ jñānaṃ labdhavyamityata āha-śrāvayediti //38//
GSP33brsgor1u:5208: sarvaṃ jagatprāṇānniḥsṛtaṃ utpannaṃ prāṇe cidātmani prerake sati ejati ceṣṭate,
GSP33brsgor1u:5209: tacca prāṇākhyaṃ kāraṇaṃ mahadbrahma vibhetyasmāditi bhayam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5212: ya etatprāṇākhyaṃ brahma nirviśeṣaṃ viduste muktā bhavantītyāha-ya iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5219: ataḥ prāṇopāstiparaṃ vākyamiti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣayati-prasiddheḥ pañcavṛttiriti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5221: atrāpi sarvaceṣṭābhayahetutvaṃ brahmaliṅgamastīti nāsti pūrvapakṣāvasaro gatārthatvāditi,
GSP33brsgor1u:5223: pratiṣṭhāya sthitiṃ labdhvā prāṇe vāyau nimitte jagaccalatīti prasiddham /
GSP33brsgor1u:5231: tadu nātyeti brahmānāśritaḥ ko 'pi loko nāstyevetyukārārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5234: brahmaṇi vajraśabdaḥ kathamityāśaṅkya gauṇa ityāha-vajraśabda iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5236: tatraiva vāyūpāstiprakaraṇaṃ samāpya 'atha hainamuṣastaḥ papraccha'iti jñeyātmānamuktvā vāyvādernāśitvokterityāha-yattu vāyvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5245: ghaṭādiviṣayāvarakatamonāśakaṃ sauramityarthaḥ pūrvatra brahmaprakaraṇasyānugrāhakaḥ sarvaśabdasaṃkocādyayogo 'stīti prāṇaśrutirbrahmaṇi nītā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5246: na tathātra 'ya ātmāpahatapāpmā'iti prakaraṇasyānugrāhakaṃ paśyāma iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣamāha-prasiddhamevetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5248: nanu jyotiradhikaraṇe jyotiḥśabdasya brahmaṇi vṛtteruktatvātkathaṃ pūrvapakṣa ityata āha-jyotiriti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5252_0: 'tā vā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyaḥ'iti kaṇḍikayā nāḍīnāṃ raśmīnāṃ ca mithaḥ saṃśleṣamuktvā
GSP33brsgor1u:5252_1: atha saṃjñālopānantaraṃ yatra kāle etanmaraṇaṃ yathā syāttathotkrāmati atha tadā
GSP33brsgor1u:5254: tathaivātrāpi śarīrātsamutthāya mṛtvā paraṃ jyotirādityākhyamupasaṃpadya taddvārā brahmalokaṃ gatvā svasvarūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5256: ato mārgasthasūryopāstyā kramamuktiparaṃ vākyamiti prāpte siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5257: vyākhyeyatvenopakrānta ātmaivātra jyotiḥśabdena vyākhyena iti jyotirvākyenaikavākyatāprayojakaprakaraṇānugṛhītottamarapuruṣaśrutyā vākyabhedakajyotiḥśrutirbādhyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5260: paratvena viśeṣitasya jyotiṣa eva sa uttama iti parāmarśenāśarīratvaniścayādityāha-paramiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5262: nāḍīkhaṇḍe daharopāsakasya yā sūryaprāptiruktā sa na mokṣa iti yuktā sūryoktiḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5263_1: śrutivyatyāsena svarūpaṃ sākṣātkṛtya paraṃ jyotistadevopasaṃpadyata iti vyākhyeyamiti bhāvaḥ //40 //
GSP33brsgor1u:5274: vai nāmeti prasiddhiliṅgasyākāśaśruteśca vākyaśeṣagatābhyāṃ brahmātmaśrutibhyāmanekaliṅgopetābhyāṃ bādho yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5275: yatra bahupramāṇasaṃvādastatra vākyasya tātparyamiti nirṇayāditi siddhāntayati-paramevetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5278: 'anena jīvena'ityatra jīvasya brahmabhedena tatkartṛtvamucyate sākṣādayogāditi pariharati-bāḍhamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5282: atrākāśaśabdasya brahmaṇi vṛttiṃ siddhavatkṛtya tatra saṃśayādipravṛtteruktatvāditi na paunaruktyamiti bhāvaḥ //41//
GSP33brsgor1u:5288: ahandhīgamyeṣu katama ātmeti janakapraśne yājñavalkya āha-yo 'yamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5299: siddhānte jīvānuvādena tataḥ kalpitabhedabhinnasya prājñasya paramātmanaḥ svarūpaikyapramitiriti phalam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5305: puruṣaḥ śarīraṃ prājño jīva iti bhrāntiṃ vārayati-tatra puruṣa ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5306: dehasya vedanāprasakterniṣedhāyogātpuruṣo jīva eva, prājñastu rūḍhyā para evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5310: vastutaḥ sarvavikriyāśūnya ityukterna saṃsāriṇi tātparyamityāha-yata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5320: hi yasmādātmā suṣuptau sarvaśokātītaḥ tasmādhṛdayasyaiva sarve śokā iti śrutyarthaḥ //42//
GSP33brsgor1u:5333: iti śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāye tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3//
GSP33brsgor1u:5339: veditanyaṃ priyaṃ vande prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ param //1//
GSP33brsgor1u:5342: ānumānikam apy ekeṣām iti cen na śarīra-rūpaka-vinyasta-gṛhīter darśayati ca | BBs_1,4.1 |
GSP33brsgor1u:5349: tenāśabdatvanirūpaṇena brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ samanvayo dṛḍhīkṛto bhavatītyadhyāyasaṃgatirapyadhikaraṇatrayasya jñeyā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5351_0: tatkiṃ pradhānaparaṃ pūrvoktaśarīraparaṃ veti smṛtiprakaraṇābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvamaprasiddhabrahmaparatvaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:5353: tathā ca brahmapradhānayorvikalpena kāraṇatvāt brahmaṇyeva vedāntānāṃ samanvaya iti niyamāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5365: nanu śabdapratyabhijñāyāmartho 'pi pratyabhijñāyata ityāśaṅkya yaugikācchabdāsati niyāmake nārthaviśeṣadhīrityāha-sa ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5366: rūḍhyā taddhīrityāśaṅkya rūḍhiḥ kiṃ laukikī smārtā vā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5370: yattu smārtakramapratyabhijñayā kramikārthaḥ smārta eveti, tatrāha-naca krameti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5372: pūrvajñātarūpārthasya sthāne tadviruddhārthajñāne sati tasya dhīrnāstītyatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-na hīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5375: tasya pūrvavākye ātmabuddhyormadhyasthānapaṭhitasyātrāpi madhyasthenāvyaktaśabdena grahaṇānna pradhānasya vaidikatvamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5376: smārtakramaḥ kimiti tyaktavya ityāśaṅkya śrautakramasya prakaraṇādyanugraheṇa balavattvādityāha-kuta ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5381: yadyavivekī tadā manoraśanābaddhāṃstān pravartayatīti manasaḥ pragrahatvaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5384: nanu svataścidātmano bhogasaṃbhavāt kiṃ rathādinetyata āha-ātmeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5385: ātmā dehaḥ, dehādisaṅkakalpanayā bhoktṛtvaṃ na svato 'saṅgatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5387: śarīrasya prakṛtatve 'pyavyaktapadena pradhānaṃ gṛhyatāmityata āha-tatra ya eveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5393: tato grahebhyaḥ śreṣṭhā atigrahā viṣayā iti bṛhadāraṇyake śravaṇāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:5411: nanvaprakṛtā sā kathamucyate, taduktau ca pradhānena kimaparāddhamityata āha-sā ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5413: pūrvaṃ vyaṣṭibuddhyabhedenoktātra tato bhedena paratvamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5414: tarhi ratharathinau dvau pariśiṣṭau syātāṃ, netyāha-etasmiṃstviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5420: kiñca brahmātmaikatvaparatve granthe bhedavādināṃ pradhānasyāvakāśo nāstītyāha-śarīretyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5422: kāṭhakagranthasyaikyatātparye gūḍhatvajñeyatvajñānahetuyogavidhaye liṅgāni santītyāha-tathā caiṣa ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5447: yannāśānmuktiḥ sā svīkāryā, tāṃ vinaiva sṛṣṭau muktānāṃ punarbandhāpatterityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5462: avyaktasya paratve 'pi śarīrasya kiṃ jātaṃ, tadāha-tacceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5468: kathaṃ tasya mahato jīvātparatvamityāśaṅkya dvitīyasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-tadadhīnatvācceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5472: avyaktapadabalāt prakṛtamapi sthūlaṃ tyajyata iti śaṅkate-āmnātasyeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5474: tava mate tasyā abhāvātkutor'thabodha iti samādhatte-neti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5475: tāṃ vināpyarthathīḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5476: śarīraśabdena rūḍhyā sthūlaṃ prakṛtaṃ tasya hāniraprakṛtasya bhūtasūkṣmasyāvyaktapadena grahaṇamanyāyyaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5479: ākāṅkṣayā vākyaikavākyatve sati prakṛtaṃ śarīradvayamavyaktapadena grāhyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5482: tadarthaṃ sūkṣmamevākāṅkṣitaṃ grāhyam;tasya sūkṣmatvenātmābhedena gṛhītasya duḥśodhatvāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:5483: sthūlasya dṛṣṭadaurgandhyādinā laśunādivadanātmatvadhīvairāgyayoḥ sulabhatvāditi śaṅkate-na ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5484: dṛṣṭā bībhatsā ghṛṇā yasmin tasya bhāvastattā tayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5488: kintu vaiṣṇavaṃ paramaṃ padaṃ vivakṣitamiti taddarśanārthaṃ prakṛtaṃ sthūlamevāvyaktapadena grāhyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5489: kiñca sūkṣmasya liṅgāntaḥpātina indriyādigrahaṇenaiva grahaṇānna pṛthagavyaktaśarīrapadābhyāṃ grahaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5500: nahi śakyamiti ca vadadbhiḥ pradhānaṃ jñeyatvena smaryata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5501: na kevalaṃ bhedapratiyogitvena pradhānasya jñeyatvaṃ tairiṣṭaṃ kintu tasyopāsanayāṇimādiprāptaye 'pītyāha-kvacicceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5503: upadiṣṭaṃ hi jñānaṃ phalavaditi jñātuṃ śakyaṃ niṣphalasyopadeśāyogādavyaktasya ca jñānānupadeśātphalavajjñānagamyatvāsiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5506: nanu śarīrasyāpi jñeyatvānukteḥ kathamiha grahaṇaṃ, tatrāha-asmākaṃ tviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5507: asmanmate viṣṇavākhyapadasyaikasyaiva jñeyatvāttaddarśanārthamavyaktapadena śarīropanyāso yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5508: sādhāraṇaśabdamātrānna pradhānasya pratyabhijñā smārtaliṅgasyānuktyā niyāmakābhāvāditi tātparyam //4//
GSP33brsgor1u:5512: vadatīti cen na prājño hi prakaraṇāt | BBs_1,4.5 |
GSP33brsgor1u:5519: trayāṇām eva caivam upanyāsaḥ praśnaś ca | BBs_1,4.6 |
GSP33brsgor1u:5521: mṛtyunā naciketasaṃ prati trīnvarānvṛṇīṣvetyukteḥ trayāṇāmeva praśno naciketasā kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5525: he mṛtyo, sa mahyaṃ dattavarastvaṃ svargahetumagni smarasi /
GSP33brsgor1u:5531: yāḥ svarūpato yāvatīḥ saṃkhyāto yathā vā krameṇāgniścīyate tatsarvamuvācetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5532: hantedānīṃ brahma vakṣyāmīti brahmavākyena jīvapraśnādvyavahitanamapi 'yathā ca maraṇaṃ prāpya'ityādi vākyaṃ jīvaviṣayamuttaraṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5534: vākyārthastu ātmā maraṇaṃ prāpya yathā bhavati tathā vakṣyāmīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5539: evaṃ ca trayāṇāmevopanyāsaḥ praśnaśca yataḥ ato na pradhānamavyaktamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5541: ekaḥ praśnaḥ dvau praśnau veti pakṣadvaye phalitaṃ pṛcchati-kiñcāta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5544: praśnaikye sūtrāsaṃgatiḥ bhede pradhānasya śrautatvasiddhiriti pūrvavādyāha-sa evetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5550: itaḥ punaḥ martyalokaṃ prāptasya mama pitā yathāpūrvaṃ sumanāḥ syāditi prathamaṃ vavre /
GSP33brsgor1u:5551: nanu dvitīyavaro jīvavidyā tṛtīyo brahmavidyeti praśnabhedaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-yeyamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5552: prete ityupakramya tṛtīyatvoktiliṅgājjīvātmavidyaiva tṛtīyo vara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5553: evaṃ vākyopakrame sati praśnāntaraṃ na yuktamityāha-tatreti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5554: maraṇadharmādyasparśaliṅgābhyāṃ praṣṭavyayorjīveśvarayorbhedāt praśnabhedasiddhervākyabādho yukta iti śaṅkate-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5556: na kevalaṃ praṣṭavyabhedāt praśnabhedaḥ kintu praśnavākyayoḥ sādṛśyābhāvādapītyāha-praśnacchāyeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5558: kiñca brahmāpraśne janmādiniṣedhena jīvasvarūpaṃ vadan yamastayoraikyaṃ sūcayatītyāha-iha cānyatreti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5562: kiñca jīvo brahmābhinnaḥ, mokṣahetujñānaviṣayatvāt, brahmavadityāha-tathā svapneti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5564: yena sākṣiṇā pramātā paśyati tāmātmānamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5566: kiñcābhedamuktvā bhedasya ninditatvādabheda eva satya ityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5568: evamihākhaṇḍaikarase brahmaṇi yo nāneva mithyābhedaṃ paśyati sa bhedadarśī maraṇānmaraṇaṃ prāpnoti saṃsārabhayānna mucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5569: kiñca jīvapraśnānantaraṃ 'taṃ durdarśam'iti yaduttaramuvāca tenāpyuttareṇābhedo gamyata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5571: putrādikaṃ vṛṇīṣvetyukte 'pi viṣayāṃstucchīkṛtyātmajñānānna cacāla 'nānyaṃ tasmānnaciketā vṛṇīte'iti śravaṇāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:5572: tadā saṃtuṣṭo yamaḥ 'anyacchreyo 'nyadutaiva preyaḥ'iti bhogāpavargamārgayorvailakṣaṇyaṃ pratijñāya 'dūramete viparīte viṣūcī avidyā yā ca vidyā'iti darśitavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5573: preyaḥ priyatamaṃ svargādikaṃ, viṣūcī viruddhaphale, avidyā karma, vidyā tattvadhīḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5575_0: yataḥ tvā tvāṃ bahavo 'pi kāmāḥ putrādayo mayā dīyamānā durlabhā api nālolupanta
GSP33brsgor1u:5575_1: lobhavantaṃ na kṛtavanta iti praṣṭāraṃ stutvā praśnamapi 'tvādṛṅgo bhūyānnaciketaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:5576: iyaṃ praśaṃsā praśnabhedapakṣe na ghaṭata ityāha-yatpraśneti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5577: yatpraśnena stutiṃ labdhavāṃstaṃ praśnaṃ vihāya yadyanyamevotthāpayet tarhyanavasare stutīḥ kṛtā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5582: avidyānāśānantaraṃ brahmatvaṃ cedāgantukamanityaṃ ca syādityata āha-na cāvidyāvattva iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5583: jīvasya brahmatve svābhāvike sati brahmapraśnasya yaduttaraṃ tajjīvapraśnasyāpi bhavatīti lābhaṃ darśayati-tataśca na jāyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5602: 'tamasaḥ parastādi'tyādinā śokātyayatamaḥ paratvādibhyaśca mahacchabdaḥ sāṃkhyatattvaṃ nābhidhatta iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5610_0: tatkiṃ pradhānaparaṃ māyāparaṃ veti rūḍhyarthāsaṃbhavātsaṃśaye pūrvatrāvyaktaśabdamātreṇa
GSP33brsgor1u:5611: phalaṃ pūrvapakṣe brahmaṇi samanvayāsiddhiḥ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti pūrvavaddraṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5614: avayavāḥ pradhānasya rajādayasteṣāṃ dharmā rañjakatvādayaḥ tairnimittairlohitādiśabdaiḥ pradhānamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5628: viśeṣagrahahetoḥ prakaraṇāderabhāvāditi hetuṃ vyākhyāya dṛṣṭāntaṃ vyācaṣṭe-camasavaditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:5633: jyotirupakramā tu tathā hy adhīyata eke | BBs_1,4.9 |
GSP33brsgor1u:5640: kiñca lohitādiśabdairapi dravyalakṣaṇā nyāyyā avyavadhānāt na tu rañjanīyatvādiguṇavyavahitā sattvādiguṇalakṣaṇetyāha-lohitādīnāṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5641: nanu śākhāntareṇa śākhāntarasthamantrasya nirṇayaḥ kathamityata āha-asaṃdigdheneti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5643: yathā śākhāntaravākyānna pradhānagrahastathehāpi śvetāśvataropaniṣadi māyāprakaraṇānna tadbrahma ityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5645_0: brahmavādino dhyānākhyayogena paramātmānamanupraviṣṭāḥ santaḥ tatraiva devasyātmabhūtāmaikyenādhyastāṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:5645_1: śaktiṃ paratantrāṃ māyāṃ sattvādiguṇavatīṃ brahmaṇaḥ sahāyamapaśyannityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5646: māyāyā ekatve 'pi tadaṃśānāṃ jīvopādhīnāṃ tattasaṃghātayonīnāmavidyākhyānāṃ bhedādvīpsā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5658: kiṃ tejobannetvajāśabdo rūḍho, na jāyata iti yaugiko vā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5672: naca yogasya mukhyavṛttitvāttena pradhānagraho nyāyya iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5675: tathāca rohitādiśabdasamabhivyāhārānugṛhītayā rūḍhyāśritayā guṇavṛttyā pradhāne yogaṃ bādhitvāvāntaraprakṛtirajāśabdena grāhya,
GSP33brsgor1u:5676: yathā madhvādiśabdaiḥ prasiddhamadhvādyāśritaguṇalakṣaṇaya ādityādayo gṛhyante tadvat /
GSP33brsgor1u:5681: na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi nānābhāvād atirekāc ca | BBs_1,4.11 |
GSP33brsgor1u:5683_0: pañcajanaśabdaḥ sāṃkhyatattvaparo 'nyaparo veti yogarūḍhyoraniścayāt saṃśaye yathā
GSP33brsgor1u:5686: tatra catvāraḥ sūtraṃ annaṃ virāṭ tayoḥ kāraṇamavyākṛtamākāśaśca yasminnadhyastāstamevātmānamamṛtaṃ brahma manye /
GSP33brsgor1u:5688: nanvastu pañcatvaśiṣṭeṣu pañcajaneṣu punaḥ pañcatvānvayāt pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyāpratītiḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5689: tāvatā kathaṃ sāṃkhyatattvagraha ityāśaṅkya saṃkhyāyā dharmyākāṅkṣāyāṃ tattvāni grāhyāṇītyāha-tatheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5694: ahaṅkārastāmasaḥ pañcatanmātrāṇāṃ śabdādīnāṃ prakṛtiḥ, sāttvika ekādaśendriyāṇām /
GSP33brsgor1u:5695: pañca tanmātrāśca pañcānāṃ sthūlabhūtānāmākāśādīnāṃ prakṛtayaḥ pañca sthūlabhūtānyekādaśendriyāṇi ceti ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyāko gaṇo vikāra eva na prakṛtiḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5700: pañcsu pañcasu sādhāraṇasyetarapañcakāddhyāvṛttasya dharmasyābhāvo 'tra nānātvaṃ vivakṣitamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5701: yadyapi jñānakarmendriyeṣu daśasu jñānakaraṇatvaṃ karmakaraṇatvaṃ ca pañcakadvaye 'sti,
GSP33brsgor1u:5703: tathāpi yasminnityātmana ākāśasya ca pṛthagukteḥ sattvarajastamomahadahaṅkārāḥ pañca kartavyāḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5710: yathā dvāvaśvinau saptarṣayo 'ṣṭau vasavaśceti saptadaśetyatrāśvitvādikamādāya dvitvādayaḥ praviśantiḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5712: pañcaśabdadvayena svavācyanyūnasaṃkhyādvāreṇa tadvyāpyā mahāsaṃkhyaiva lakṣyata iti sadṛṣṭāntaṃ śaṅkate-atheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5713: mukhyārthasya vakṣyamāṇatvāllakṣaṇā na yukteti pariharati-tadapi neti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5720: tathāca na dvitīyapañcaśabdajanaśabdayoḥ samāsaṃ vināntyasyākārasyodāttatvaṃ pūrveṣāmanudāttatatvaṃ ca ghaṭate 'samāsasya'iti sūtreṇa samāsasyāntodāttavidhānāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:5721_0: 'anudāttaṃ padamekavarjam'iti ca sūtreṇa yasminpade udāttaḥ svarito vā yasya varṇasya
GSP33brsgor1u:5721_1: vidhīyate tamekaṃ varjayitvāvaśiṣṭaṃ tatpadamanudāttaṃ bhavatīti vidhānādeva māntrikāntodāttasvareṇaikapadatvaniścayaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:5721_3: yo mantradaśāyāmanudāttaḥ svarito vā sa brāhmaṇadaśāyāmudātto bhavatītyapavāda āśritaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5724: tathā cāntyanakārāduparitana ākāra ākāśaścetyanena śliṣṭatayā paṭhyamāno 'nudātto bhavati,
GSP33brsgor1u:5728: antānudāttaṃ hi samāmnātāraḥ pañcajanaśabdamadhīyata iti pāṭhakaprasiddhirasiddheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5729: tathā ca pañca pañcajanā iti māntrikāntodāttaḥ svaraḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5730: yasmin pañca pañcajanā ityantānudātto brāhnasvara iti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5734: tvā tvāṃ pañcānāṃ pañcajanānāṃ devaviśeṣāṇāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmi ityājyagrahaṇamantraśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5735: devatānāṃ karmaṇi yantradavasthitaṃ śarīraṃ tadeva dhartraṃ ihāmitrabhogādhāraṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5739: janapañcakamekaṃ pañcakānāṃ pañcakaṃ dvitīyamiti pañcakadvayaṃ tasya pañcapañceti grahaṇaṃ netyakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5752: pañcānāṃ pūlānāṃ samāhārā ityatra 'saṃkhyāpūrvo dviguḥ'iti samāso vihitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5753: tato 'dvigoḥ'iti sūtreṇa ṅīpo vidhānāt samāhārapratītau samāhārāḥ katītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyāṃ pañcetipadāntarānvayo yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5754: pañcajanā ityatra tu ṅībantatvābhāvena samāhārasyāpratīteḥ janānāṃ cādita eva pañcatvopādānātsaṃkhyākāṅkṣāyā asattvātpañceti padāntaraṃ nānveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5757: nanu janānāṃ nirākāṅkṣatve 'pi tadviśeṣaṇībhūtapañcatvāni katītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ pañcatvāntaraṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavatvityāśaṅkate-bhavadapīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5758: nopasarjanasyopasarjanāntareṇānvayaḥ kintu pradhānenaiveti nopasarjanyāyavirodha ukta iti pariharati-tatra ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5770: kiṃ ca pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyāpratītāvapi na sāṃkhyatattvānāṃ grahaṇamityāha-kathaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5775: pañca ca te janāśceti karmadhārayādisamāsāntarātsaṃjñāsamāsasyāptoktyā balavattvaṃ tāvadāha-ucyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5776: vigvācinaḥ saṃkhyāvācinaśca śabdāḥ saṃjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ subantetottarapadena samasyante /
GSP33brsgor1u:5783: pañcajanaśabdasya saṃjñātvamuktvā saṃjñikathanārthaṃ sūtraṃ gṛhṇāti-ke punasta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5785: ye prāṇādiprerakaṃ tatsākṣiṇamātmānaṃ viduste brahmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5786: pañcajanaśabdasya prāṇādiṣu kayā vṛttyā prayoga iti śaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5787: yathā tava tattveṣu janaśabdasya lakṣaṇaya prayogastathā mama prāṇādiṣu pañcajanaśabdasya lakṣaṇayetyāha-tattveṣviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5795: janakatvājjanaḥ pradhānamiti yogasaṃbhave kimiti rūḍhimāśritya lakṣaṇāprayāsa ityata āha-samāseti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5796: yathā aśvakarṇaśabdasya varṇasamudāyasya vṛkṣe rūḍhirevaṃ pañcajanaśabdasya rūḍhireva nāvayavaśaktyātmako yoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5799: janasaṃbandhācceti pūrvabhāṣye nareṣu pañcajanaśabdasya rūḍhimāśritya prāṇādiṣu lakṣaṇoktā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5800: iha tu prauḍhivādena prāṇādiṣu rūḍhirucyata iti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5803: tataśṭodbhidetyaprasiddhasya tṛtīyāntasya yāgenetyanena prasiddhārthakena sāmānādhikaraṇyena tannāmatvaṃ niścīyate,
GSP33brsgor1u:5806: tathā chinattīti prasiddhārthacchedanayogyārthakaśabdasamabhivyāhārāddāruviśeṣo yūpaśabdārthaḥ karotīti samabhivyāhārādvediśabdārthaḥ saṃskārayogyasthaṇḍilaviśeṣa iti gamyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:5807: tathā prasiddhārtakaprāṇādiśabdasamabhivyāhārāt pañcajanaśabdaḥ prāṇādyarthaka iti niścīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5811: pāñcajanyayā prajayā viśatīti viṭ tayā viśāpuruṣarūpayendrasyāhvānārthaṃ ghoṣāḥ sṛṣṭā iti yattadyuktaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5812: ghoṣātirekeṇendrāhvānāyogāditi śrutyanusāreṇa prajāmātragrahe 'pi na virodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5820: jyotiṣāṃ sūryādīnāṃ jyotistadbrahma devā upāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5822: tatkāṇvānāṃ pañacatvapūraṇāya gṛhyate nānyeṣāmiti vikalpo na yukta iti śaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5824: yathā atirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti iti vākyabhedādvikalpastadvacchākhābhedenānnapāṭhāpāṭhābhyāṃ jyotiṣo vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5825: nanu kriyāyāṃ vikalpo yukto na vastunīti cet /
GSP33brsgor1u:5827: atrāpi śākhāmedena sānnā jyotiḥsahitā vā pañca prāṇādayo yatra pratiṣṭhitāstanmanasānudraṣṭavyamiti dhyānakriyāyāṃ vikalpopapattirityanavadyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5836: adhikaraṇatrayeṇa pradhānasyāśrautatvoktyā jagatkāraṇatvalakṣaṇena brahmaṇa eva buddhisthatā,
GSP33brsgor1u:5837: tasminneva buddhisthe nirviśeṣe brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ samanvaya iti sādhitaṃ pūrvasūtrasaṃdarbheṇa /
GSP33brsgor1u:5840: na cāvirodhacintāyā dvitīyādhyāye saṃgatirnāsminnadhyāya iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5842: tatpadavācyajagatkāraṇavādiśrutīnāṃ mitho virodhādvācyārthānirṇayena lakṣye samanvayāsiddhau prāptāyāṃ tatsādhakāvirodhacintāyā atraiva saṃgatatvāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:5843: na caivaṃ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāmapyavirodho 'traiva cintanīya iti vācyam,
GSP33brsgor1u:5845: kimarthaṃ tarhi dvitīye taccintanaṃ, sthūlabuddhisamādhānārthamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5846: iha tu sūkṣmadṛśāṃ vākyārthe samanvayajñānāya tatpadārthaśrutivirodhaḥ parihriyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:5847: tadyapi tvaṃpadārthaśrutivirodho 'tra parihartavyaḥ tathāpi prathamasūtreṇa bandhamithyātvasūcanādavirodhaḥ siddhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5850_0: tāḥ kiṃ brahmaṇi mānaṃ na veti saṃśaye 'nnajyotiṣoḥ saṃkhyādṛṣṭikriyāyāṃ vikalpe
GSP33brsgor1u:5853: pūrvapakṣe samanvayāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5872: tadidaṃ jagaddha kila tarhi prākkāle 'vyākṛtaṃ kāraṇātmakāmāsīt /
GSP33brsgor1u:5875: tatra sṛṣṭau virodhamaṅgīkṛtya sraṣṭari virodhaṃ pariharati-satyapīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5876: ākāśādiṣu brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇatve virodho naivāstīti pratijñāyāṃ hetumāha-kuta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5884: yathā taittirīyake sarvajñatvādikaṃ kāraṇasya tathā chāndogyādāvapi dṛśyata ityāha-tadatra yallakṣaṇamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5887: tathāpi kārye virodhātkāraṇe 'pi virodhaḥ syādityāśaṅkya niṣedhati-kāryaviṣayaṃ tvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5888: svapnasṛṣṭīnāṃ pratyahamanyathātvena so 'hamiti pratyabhijñāyamāne draṣṭaryapi nānātvaṃ prasajyetetyāha-atiprasaṅgāditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:5896: śuṅgena kāryeṇa liṅgena kāraṇabrahmajñānārthatvaṃ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāmuktvā kāraṇasyādvayatvajñānaṃ phalāntamāha-mṛdādīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5897: evaṃ niṣphalāyāmanyārthāyāṃ sṛṣṭau tātparyābhāvādvirodho na doṣa ityatra vṛddhasaṃmatimāha-tathāceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5908: evaṃ sṛṣṭidvārakaṃ virodhamutsūtraṃ samādhāya kāraṇasya sadasattvādinā sākṣācchrutivirodhanirāsārthaṃ sūtramādatte-yatpunariti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5910: ato 'tra śloke nirātmakamasanna śrāvyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5911: tat tatra sadātmani śloko mantro bhavati /
GSP33brsgor1u:5919: eke śākhina ityartho na bhavati, kintu anādisaṃsāracakrasthā vedabāhyā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5920: śūnyanirāsena śrutibhiḥ sadvādasyaiveṣṭatvāttāsāṃ virodhasphūrtinirāsāya lakṣaṇā yukteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5923: nanu kartrabhāva eva parāmṛśyata ityata āha-cetanasya cāyamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5924: cakṣurdraṣṭā, śrotraṃ śrotā, mano mantetyucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5927: nanu karmakārakādanyasya kartuḥ sattve karmaṇa eva kartṛvācilakāro viruddha ityata āha-vyākriyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5930: vyākriyate jagatsvayameva niṣpannamiti vyākhyāya kenacidvyākṛtamiti vyācaṣṭe-yadveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5938: balākāyā apatyaṃ bālākirbrāhmaṇastaṃ prati rājovāca-yo vā iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5939: na kevalamādityādīnāṃ kartā kintu sarvasya jagata ityāha-yasyeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5944: iha tu vākyabhedāt 'brahma te bravāṇi'iti bālākivākyasthabrahmaśabdena prāṇādiśabdo brahmaparatvena netumāśakya iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣamāha--kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:5945: pūrvapakṣe vākyasya prāṇādyupāstiparatvādbrahmaṇi samanvayāsiddhiḥ siddhānte jñeye samanvayasiddhiriti phalam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5948: śrutaṃ puruṣakartṛtvaṃ prāṇasya kathamityata āha-ye caita iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5949: sūtrātmakaprāṇasya vikāraḥ sūryādaya ityatra mānamāha-kratama iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5950: yasya mahimānaḥ sarve devā iti pūrvavākye darśitaṃ, ataḥ sarvadevātmakatvāt, sa prāṇo brahma /
GSP33brsgor1u:5954: yatkāraṇaṃ yasmājjīvaṃ bodhayati tasmādasti suptotthāpanaṃ jīvaliṅgamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5956: taṃ rājā he bṛhatpāṇḍaravāsaḥ somarājannityāmantrya saṃbodhya saṃbodhanānabhijñatvāt prāṇāderanātmatvamuktvā yaṣṭhyāghātenotthāpya jīvaṃ bodhitavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5957: śroṣṭhī pradhānaḥ svairbhṛtyairjñātibhirupahṛtaṃ bhuṅkte svāḥ jñātayaśca tamupajīvanti,
GSP33brsgor1u:5958: evaṃ jīvo 'pi ādityādibhiḥ prakāśādinā bhogopakaraṇairbhuṅkte te ca havirgrahaṇādinā jīvamupajīvantītyuktaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ jīvaliṅgam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5959: nanu 'prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'iti śrutaḥ prāṇaśabdo jīve kathamityata āha-prāṇabhṛttvācceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5961: sa ca bālākirbrahmatvabhrāntyā vyaṣṭiliṅgarūpānpuruṣānuktvā rājñā nirastastūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5962: tvaduktaṃ brahma mṛṣetyuktvā rājñocyamānaṃ brahmaiveti vaktavyamanyathārājño 'pi mṛṣāvāditvaprasaṅgādityāha-yadi so 'pīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5966: yaduktaṃ calanādṛṣṭayorvācakaḥ karmaśabdaḥ prāṇajīvayorupasthāpaka iti, tannetyāha-yasyeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5968: atra prakaraṇopapadayorasattvātkasya grahaṇamiti saṃśaye puruṣakartṛpadasāṃnidhyāt kriyata iti yogājjagadgrahaṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5971: nanu puruṣotpādakasya karturvyāpāraḥ karotyarthaṃ utpādanaṃ tasyaphalaṃ puruṣajanma tadanyataravācī karmaśabdo 'stvityata āha-nāpīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5975: prakaraṇādikaṃ hi sarvanāmnaḥ saṃkocakaṃ, tasminnasati sāmānyena buddhisthaṃ sarvameva gṛhyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:5976: atra ca saṃkocakāsattvātsarvārthakena sarvanāmnā buddhisthasya kāryamātrasya karmaśabdo vācaka ityāha-tathāpīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5981: brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyāḥ parivrājakāścetyatra yathā brahmaṇaśabdaḥ parivrājakānyaviṣayaḥ tathātra karmaśabdaḥ puruṣānyajagadvācītyāha-evamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5982: astu jagatkartā veditavyaḥ, parameśvarasya kimāyātamityata āha-parameśvareti //16//
GSP33brsgor1u:5991: 'saṃbhavatyekavākyatve vākyabhedo hi neṣyate'ityuktaṃ cet punaruktiḥ syāditi śaṅkate-nanvevamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5992: karmapadasya rūḍhyā pūrvapakṣaprāptau tannirāsārthamasyārambho yukta ityāha-netyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5998: anyārthaṃ tu jaiminiḥ praśnavyākhyānābhyām api caivam eke | BBs_1,4.18 |
GSP33brsgor1u:6002: he bālāke, etacchayanaṃ viśeṣajñānābhāvarūpaṃ yathā syāttathaiṣa puruṣaḥ kvāśayiṣṭa /
GSP33brsgor1u:6005: etadbhavanamekībhāvarūpaṃ yathā syāttathā eṣa puruṣaḥ kvābhūtsuptaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6008: etadāgamanamaikyabhraṃśarūpaṃ yathā syāttathā puruṣaḥ kuta āgata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6011: uttare prāṇokteḥ praśno 'pi prāṇaviśaya ityata āha-suṣuptikāle ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6018: nanu tatrākāśaḥ suṣuptisthānamuktaṃ na brahmetyata āha-ākāśeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6020: evaṃ jīvanirāsārthakatvena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya prāṇanirāsaparatvenāpi vyācaṣṭe-prāṇeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6023: api caike śākhina evameva prāṇātiriktaṃ jīvātmānamāmanantaḥ prāṇasya vākyārthatvaṃ vārayantīti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:6032: pratyāderātmaśeṣatvena priyatvādātmaiva sarviśeṣī priyatamaḥ, ato 'nyatparityajyātmaiva draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6037: yathā 'brahma te bravāṇi'ityupakramabalādvākyasya brahmaparatvaṃ tathātra jīvopakramādasya vākyasya jīvaparatvamiti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:6038: pūrvapakṣe vākyasya jīvopāstiparatvaṃ, siddhānte jñeye pratyagbrahmaṇi samanvaya iti phalam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6044: etebhyaḥkāryakāraṇātmanā jāyamānebhyo bhūtebhayaḥ sāmyenotthāya bhūtopādhikaṃ janmānubhūya tānyeva bhūtāni nīyamānānyanusṛtya vinaśyati /
GSP33brsgor1u:6054: yathā dundubhiśaṅkhavīṇāśabdasāmānyagrahaṇenaiva gṛhyamāṇāstadavāntaraviśeṣāḥ śuktigrahaṇagrāhyarajatavat sāmānye kalpitāstato na bhidyante,
GSP33brsgor1u:6060: ayaṃ ca lokaḥ paraśca loka iti rūpam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6061: kiñca 'sa yathā sarvāsāmapāṃ samudra ekāyanam'iti kaṇḍikayā sarvaprapañcasya mukhyalayādhāratvamātmano brahmatve liṅgamityāha-tathaivaikāyaneti //19//
GSP33brsgor1u:6070: utkramiṣyata evaṃ bhāvād ity auḍulomiḥ | BBs_1,4.21 |
GSP33brsgor1u:6074: nanu saṃsārasyaupādhikatvāt sarvadaivābheda ityāśaṅkya dṛṣṭāntabalena saṃsārasya svābhāvikatvamityāha-kvacicceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6075: 'yathā nadyaḥ syandamānāḥ samudrestaṃ gacchanti nāmarūpe vihāya'iti nadinidarśanaṃ vyācaṣṭe-yathā loke iti //21//
GSP33brsgor1u:6081: atyantābhedajñāpanārthaṃ jīvamupakramya draṣṭavyatvādayo brahmadharmā uktā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6086: jīvoddeśena brahmatvapratipādane bhedo 'pyāvaśyaka iti bhedābhedaśaṅkāprāptau kalpitabhedenoddeśyatvādikaṃ svato 'tyantābheda iti jñāpanārthamasyārambhāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:6087: jñāpane cātra liṅgamātmaśabdenopakrāntasya jīvasya dharmiṇo brahmaṇo dharmyantarasya grahaṇaṃ vinaiva brahmadharmakathanaṃ bhedābhede dharmidvayagrahaḥ syāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6089_0: sarvāṇi rūpāṇi kāryāṇi vicitya sṛṣṭvā teṣaṃ nāmāni ca kṛtvā teṣu buddhyādiṣu praviśyābhivadanādikaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:6089_1: kurvan yo vartate tadvidvānihaivāmṛto bhavatīti mantro 'pi jīvaparayoraikyaṃ darśayatītyāha-mantreti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6099: kalpitasya bhedasya jñānānnivṛttiḥ saṃbhavati na satyasyetyapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6102: utpattiśrutyā jīvasya brahmaṇā bhedābhedāvityata āha-ata eveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6104: atra pūrvapakṣe bījatrayamuktaṃ jīvenopakramaḥ parasyaiva samutthānaśrutyā jīvābhedābhidhānaṃ vijñātṛśabdaśceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6107: ātmajñānātsarvavijñānaṃ yatpratijñātaṃ tatra hetuḥ 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā'ityavyatireka uktastasya pratipādanāttadeva pratijñātamupapāditamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:6111: mṛtasya saṃjñā nāstīti vākye 'traiva māṃ mohitavānasi jñānarūpasyātmano jñānābhāve nāśaprasaṅgāditi maitreyyokto munirāha-na vā are iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6117_0: kāśakṛtsnasya mate tvatyantābhedādvijñānasya kārakābhāvātsa yukta iti śrutyanusāritvāttanmate
GSP33brsgor1u:6117_1: manaḥkalpitaṃ vijñātṛtvaṃ mukte brahmātmani bhūtapūrvagatyoktamiti pariharaṇīyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6118: kiñca pūrvāparaparyālocanayā vākyasya muktātmaparatvāvagamādvijñātṛtvaṃ kalpitamevānūdyata iti na talliṅgena jīvaparatvamityāha-api ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6119: ārṣeṣu pakṣeṣu kāśakṛtsnapakṣasyaivādeyatve kiṃ bījaṃ, tadāha-darśitamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6122: hetūnāṃ bhedo na paramārthika iti pratijñayā saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6123: bhedābhedapakṣe jīvasya janmādivikāravattvāttanniṣedho na syādityāha-sa vā eṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6124: bhedasya satyatve tatpramayā bādhādahaṃ brahmeti nirvādhaṃ jñānaṃ na syādityāha-anyathāceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6128: ātyantikaikatve hi prajñā pratiṣṭhitā bhavati na bhedābhedayoriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6129: nanu jīvaparamātmānau svato bhinnau, aparyāyanāmavattvāt, stambhakumbhavadityata āha-sthite ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6131: kiñcāvidyātajjabuddhirūpāyāṃ guhāyāṃ sthito jīvo bhavati, tasyāmeva brahma nihitamiti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6135: nanvekasyāṃ guhāyāṃ dvau kiṃ na syātāmityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6137: nanvatyantābhede jīvasya spaṣṭabhānādbrahmāpi spaṣṭaṃ syādataḥ spaṣṭatvāspaṣṭatvābhyāṃ tayorbheda iti cet /
GSP33brsgor1u:6139: darpaṇe pratibimbasya sphuṭatve 'pi bimbasyāsphuṭatvavat kalpitabhedena viruddhadharmavyavasthopapatteḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6141: so 'yamitivattattvamasītyakāryakāraṇadravyasāmānādhikaraṇyādatyantābhedo vedāntārthastadbodha eva niḥśreyasasādhanaṃ tasya bādho na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6142: kiñca bhedābhadavādino jñānakarmabhyāṃ kṛtakaṃ mokṣaṃ kalpayanti, tatrānityatvaṃ doṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6143: yattu kṛtakamapi nityamiti, tacca 'yat kriyāsādhyaṃ tadanityam'iti nyāyabādhitam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6144: asmākaṃ tvanarthadhvaṃsasya jñānasādhyatvānnityamuktātmamātratvācca nānityatvadoṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6152: tatra hi brahmaṇo buddhisthatvārthaṃ sāmānyato jagatkāraṇatvaṃ lakṣaṇamuktaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6153: tena buddhisthe brahmaṇi kṛtasnavedāntasamanvayaṃ pratipādya tatkāraṇatvaṃ kiṃ kartṛtvamātramuta prakṛtitvakartṛtvobhayarūpamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6156: yadyapi tadānantaryamasya yuktaṃ tathāpi niścitatātparyairvedāntaiḥ kartṛmātreśvaramatanirāsaḥ sukara iti samanvayānte idaṃ likhitam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6172: niṣkalaṃ niravayavaṃ, niṣkriyamacalaṃ, śāntamapariṇāmi, niravadyaṃ nirastasamastadoṣam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6179: kartṛjñānādapi sarvakāryajñānaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nimittakāraṇāvyatirekastviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6181: vāgārabhyaṃ nāmamātraṃ vikāro na vastuto 'stīti satyakāraṇajñānādvikārajñānaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6184: ghaṭaḥ sphuratītyanugatasphuraṇaṃ prakṛtistadatirikeṇa vikārā na santīti so 'yamartho yathā sphuṭaḥ tathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa ucyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:6185: hanyamānadundubhijanyācchabdasāmānyādbāhyān viśeṣaśabdān sāmānyagrahaṇātirikeṇa pṛthaggrahītuṃ śrotā na śaknuyāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:6186: sāmānyasya tu grahaṇena dundubhyāghātajaśabdaviśeṣo gṛhīto bhavati,
GSP33brsgor1u:6187: tasya vā grahaṇena tadavāntaraviśeṣaśabdo gṛhīto bhavati /
GSP33brsgor1u:6188: ataḥ śabdasāmānyagrahaṇagrahyā viśeṣāḥ sāmānye kalpitāḥ tadvadātmabhānabhāsyā ghaṭādaya ātmani kalpitā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6190: 'yato vā'ityatra śrutau yata iti pañcamī prakṛtau draṣṭavyetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6193: evaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitvaṃ prasādhya kartṛtvaṃ sādhayati-nimittatvamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6216: nanu kṛterāśrayaḥsiddhobhavati viṣayastu sādhya ityekasyobhayaṃ viruddhamityāśaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6217: yathā mṛdaḥ sādhyapariṇāmābhedena kṛtiviṣayatvaṃ tadvadātmana ityāha-pariṇāmāditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:6221: nanu brahmaṇa ātmānamiti dvitīyayā kāryātmanā sādhyatvaśrutyāstu prakṛtitvaṃ kartā tvanyo 'stvityata āha-svayamiti ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6222: brahmaṇaḥ kṛtikarmatvopapādanārthaṃ pariṇāmāditi padaṃ vyākhyāyānyathāpi vyācaṣṭe-pṛthaksūtramiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6223: mṛdghaṭa itivadbrahma sacca tyacceti pariṇāmasāmānādhikaraṇyaśruterbrahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6242: nanvanupādāne 'pi strīyonau yoniśabdo dṛṣṭa ityata āha-strīyoneriti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6244: yoniśabdasya sthānamapyartho bhavati so 'tra bhūtayonyādiśabdairna grāhyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6246: he indra, te tava niṣade upaveśanāya yoniḥ, sthānaṃ mayā akāri kṛtamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6248: nanvanumānasya śrutyanapekṣatvānna tayā bādha ityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6250: yā kṛtiḥ sā śarīrajanyeti vyāptivirodhena nityakṛtimato 'numānāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:6251: ataḥ śrautamīśvaraṃ pakṣīkṛtyānupādānatvasādhane bhavatyevopajīvyayā prakṛtitvabodhakaśrutyā bādha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6254: ata ubhayarūpaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇo lakṣaṇamiti siddhām //27//
GSP33brsgor1u:6264: tathā hi chāndogye jagatkāraṇatvajñāpanārthaṃ pitā putramuvāca,
GSP33brsgor1u:6267: punaḥ pitrā kimatra paśyasītyukte na kiñcana bhagava ityāha /
GSP33brsgor1u:6272: atrāṇvādivādāḥ śrautā na veti saṃśaye satyasadaṇvādiśabdabalācchrautā iti prāpte 'tidiśati-eteneti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6278: tasminnaiva sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāṃ samanvaya iti siddham //28//
GSP33brsgor1u:6280: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya yaturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
